out-of-distribution images. This raises doubts about the quality of the
explanations. Moreover, choosing an appropriate occlusion value often requires
domain knowledge. In this paper we introduce a novel forward-pass paradigm
Activation-Deactivation (AD), which removes the effects of occluded input
features from the model's decision-making by switching off the parts of the
model that correspond to the occlusions. We introduce ConvAD, a drop-in
mechanism that can be easily added to any trained Convolutional Neural Network
(CNN), and which implements the AD paradigm. This leads to more robust
explanations without any additional training or fine-tuning. We prove that the
ConvAD mechanism does not change the decision-making process of the network. We
provide experimental evaluation across several datasets and model
architectures. We compare the quality of AD-explanations with explanations
achieved using a set of masking values, using the proxies of robustness, size,
and confidence drop-off. We observe a consistent improvement in robustness of
AD explanations (up to 62.5%) compared to explanations obtained with
occlusions, demonstrating that ConvAD extracts more robust explanations without
the need for domain knowledge.

</details>


### [230] [Typed Chain-of-Thought: A Curry-Howard Framework for Verifying LLM Reasoning](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.01069)
*Elija Perrier*

Main category: cs.AI

TL;DR: CoT提示的合理性问题可以通过将CoT推理转化为形式证明来解决，这为AI系统的可靠性和可信度提供了保障。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 当前的CoT提示虽然增强了LLM的推理能力，但其生成推理过程的可信度仍然是一个悬而未决的问题，影响了模型的可解释性。

Method: 提出了一种基于Curry-Howard对应的新理论视角，将CoT推理类比为结构良好的程序，并将CoT的非正式自然语言步骤转化为形式的、类型化的证明结构，以提取和映射推理过程。

Result: 成功地将CoT推理转化为结构良好的证明，为推理过程提供了计算上可信的、可验证的证明，实现了从启发式可解释性到形式验证的飞跃。

Conclusion: 该框架提供了一种将合理的叙述性解释转化为形式上可验证的程序的方法，为构建更可靠、更值得信赖的AI系统开辟了道路。

Abstract: While Chain-of-Thought (CoT) prompting enhances the reasoning capabilities of
large language models, the faithfulness of the generated rationales remains an
open problem for model interpretability. We propose a novel theoretical lens
for this problem grounded in the Curry-Howard correspondence, which posits a
direct relationship between formal proofs and computer programs. Under this
paradigm, a faithful reasoning trace is analogous to a well-typed program,
where each intermediate step corresponds to a typed logical inference. We
operationalise this analogy, presenting methods to extract and map the
informal, natural language steps of CoT into a formal, typed proof structure.
Successfully converting a CoT trace into a well-typed proof serves as a strong,
verifiable certificate of its computational faithfulness, moving beyond
heuristic interpretability towards formal verification. Our framework provides
a methodology to transform plausible narrative explanations into formally
verifiable programs, offering a path towards building more reliable and
trustworthy AI systems.

</details>


### [231] [Safety Instincts: LLMs Learn to Trust Their Internal Compass for Self-Defense](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.01088)
*Guobin Shen,Dongcheng Zhao,Haibo Tong,Jindong Li,Feifei Zhao,Yi Zeng*

Main category: cs.AI

TL;DR: LLM安全可通过利用模型自身识别有害内容的内在“安全本能”来提升，而无需外部标注。SIRL通过强化低熵的拒绝行为来生成奖励信号，已在Llama和Qwen模型上验证，在抵御20多种攻击的同时保持了在数学、编程和对话方面的性能。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: LLM安全面临通用标准和可靠内容验证器缺失的挑战，难以获得有效的训练信号。本研究旨在发掘并利用LLM内在的、关于其自身安全信念的信号。

Method: 提出安全本能强化学习（SIRL）方法，该方法利用LLM在面对有害请求时产生高置信度拒绝，而在生成潜在危险内容时产生高熵的内在特性，将这种“熵差”转化为自生成的奖励信号，用于强化模型的拒绝行为。

Result: 在Llama和Qwen模型上，SIRL实现了超过89%的防御成功率（DSR），能抵御20多种从静态提示到自适应攻击的越狱方法。仅使用15,000个未标记的提示，SIRL的性能优于资源消耗大的监督学习方法，同时保持了在数学、编程和对话基准上的性能。

Conclusion: LLM的有效对齐可以源于模型内部的机制，SIRL方法展示了利用模型内在安全信念进行自我监督对齐的可能性，为开发更自主、鲁棒且可扩展的AI安全机制开辟了新途径，减少了对大规模人工监督的依赖。

Abstract: Ensuring Large Language Model (LLM) safety remains challenging due to the
absence of universal standards and reliable content validators, making it
difficult to obtain effective training signals. We discover that aligned models
already possess robust internal safety beliefs: they consistently produce
high-confidence refusals to harmful requests while exhibiting high entropy when
generating potentially dangerous content. This entropy gap reveals an untapped
signal--models intrinsically "know" when to refuse. We introduce Safety
Instincts Reinforcement Learning (SIRL), which transforms this internal
confidence into a self-generated reward signal, eliminating dependence on
external validators or human annotations. SIRL teaches models to trust their
safety instincts by reinforcing low-entropy refusal behaviors. Evaluated on
Llama and Qwen models, SIRL maintains 89%+ Defense Success Rates (DSRs) against
20+ jailbreak methods, from static prompts to adaptive attacks. Using only
15,000 unlabeled prompts, SIRL surpasses resource-intensive supervised methods
while preserving performance on mathematics, coding, and conversation
benchmarks. Our work demonstrates that effective alignment can emerge from
within, paving the way for more autonomous and robust AI safety mechanisms that
scale without extensive human oversight.

</details>


### [232] [Optimizing Fairness in Production Planning: A Human-Centric Approach to Machine and Workforce Allocation](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.01094)
*Alexander Nasuta,Alessandro Cisi,Sylwia Olbrych,Gustavo Vieira,Rui Fernandes,Lucas Paletta,Marlene Mayr,Rishyank Chevuri,Robert Woitsch,Hans Aoyang Zhou,Anas Abdelrazeq,Robert H. Schmitt*

Main category: cs.AI

TL;DR: 本研究提出了一种两层、以人为中心的生产规划框架，旨在优化工业制造中的运营效率和劳动力公平性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 在工业制造中，同时优化生产效率和劳动力公平性是一个挑战。本研究旨在提出一个框架来解决这个问题。

Method: 该框架包含两层：第一层将订单-生产线分配问题制定为约束规划（CP）问题，生成高利用率的生产计划；第二层将工人-生产线分配问题建模为马尔可夫决策过程（MDP），考虑工人偏好、经验、适应性和医疗限制。使用贪婪分配、MCTS和RL三种策略进行求解和比较。

Result: CP方法生成的生产计划紧凑、可行且延迟低。MDP方法在公平性和偏好匹配方面显著优于基线方法。领域专家对CP和MDP组件的有效性给予了肯定，并提出进一步优化目标函数的建议。

Conclusion: 结合CP和基于学习的决策方法为以人为中心的生产规划提供了一个鲁棒的解决方案，能够同时优化吞吐量和员工福祉，为工业制造中的公平高效调度奠定了实用基础。

Abstract: This work presents a two-layer, human-centric production planning framework
designed to optimize both operational efficiency and workforce fairness in
industrial manufacturing. The first layer formulates the Order-Line allocation
as a Constraint Programming (CP) problem, generating high-utilization
production schedules that respect machine capacities, processing times, and due
dates. The second layer models Worker-Line allocation as a Markov Decision
Process (MDP), integrating human factors such as worker preference, experience,
resilience, and medical constraints into the assignment process. Three solution
strategies, greedy allocation, MCTS, and RL, are implemented and compared
across multiple evaluation scenarios. The proposed system is validated through
16 test sessions with domain experts from the automotive industry, combining
quantitative key performance indicators (KPIs) with expert ratings. Results
indicate that the CP-based scheduling approach produces compact, feasible
production plans with low tardiness, while the MDP-based worker allocation
significantly improves fairness and preference alignment compared to baseline
approaches. Domain experts rated both the Order-Line and Worker-Line components
as effective and highlighted opportunities to further refine the objective
function to penalize excessive earliness and improve continuity in worker
assignments. Overall, the findings demonstrate that combining CP with
learning-based decision-making provides a robust approach for human-centric
production planning. The approach enables simultaneous optimization of
throughput and workforce well-being, offering a practical foundation for fair
and efficient manufacturing scheduling in industrial settings.

</details>


### [233] [PRISM-Consult: A Panel-of-Experts Architecture for Clinician-Aligned Diagnosis](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.01114)
*Lionel Levine,John Santerre,Alexander S. Young,T. Barry Levine,Francis Campion,Majid Sarrafzadeh*

Main category: cs.AI

TL;DR: PRISM-Consult是一个由领域专家组成的模型，用于对临床事件进行分类，实现了高效、可解释和低延迟的医疗咨询。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 开发一个能够高效、安全地处理大规模临床数据的模型，以支持临床决策。

Method: 提出PRISM-Consult架构，该架构包含一个轻量级路由器和多个领域专家模型。路由器根据临床事件的初始标记将其分发给相应的专家模型（如心血管、肺部、胃肠、肌肉骨骼、精神科）。专家模型继承了PRISM模型的紧凑Transformer骨干和标记模板，实现了参数效率和可解释性。

Result: 在真实世界的急诊科队列中，PRISM-Consult模型实现了平稳收敛和较低的开发困惑度。路由器在保证安全的前提下，实现了高质量的路由和显著的计算节省。报告了按领域划分的结果，避免了常见事件的主导。

Conclusion: PRISM-Consult架构为实现安全、可审计、低延迟的大规模临床咨询提供了一条实用的途径。文章还概述了满足临床部署标准的验证步骤，包括外部/时间复制、不对称的生命威胁阈值和多标签仲裁。

Abstract: We present PRISM-Consult, a clinician-aligned panel-of-experts architecture
that extends the compact PRISM sequence model into a routed family of domain
specialists. Episodes are tokenized as structured clinical events; a
light-weight router reads the first few tokens and dispatches to specialist
models (Cardiac-Vascular, Pulmonary, Gastro-Oesophageal, Musculoskeletal,
Psychogenic). Each specialist inherits PRISM's small transformer backbone and
token template, enabling parameter efficiency and interpretability. On
real-world Emergency Department cohorts, specialists exhibit smooth convergence
with low development perplexities across domains, while the router achieves
high routing quality and large compute savings versus consult-all under a
safety-first policy. We detail the data methodology (initial vs. conclusive
ICD-9 families), routing thresholds and calibration, and report per-domain
results to avoid dominance by common events. The framework provides a practical
path to safe, auditable, and low-latency consult at scale, and we outline
validation steps-external/temporal replication, asymmetric life-threat
thresholds, and multi-label arbitration-to meet prospective clinical deployment
standards.

</details>


### [234] [Apriel-1.5-15b-Thinker](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.01141)
*Shruthan Radhakrishna,Aman Tiwari,Aanjaneya Shukla,Masoud Hashemi,Rishabh Maheshwary,Shiva Krishna Reddy Malay,Jash Mehta,Pulkit Pattnaik,Saloni Mittal,Khalil Slimi,Kelechi Ogueji,Akintunde Oladipo,Soham Parikh,Oluwanifemi Bamgbose,Toby Liang,Ahmed Masry,Khyati Mahajan,Sai Rajeswar Mudumba,Vikas Yadav,Sathwik Tejaswi Madhusudhan,Torsten Scholak,Sagar Davasam,Srinivas Sunkara,Nicholas Chapados*

Main category: cs.AI

TL;DR: Apriel-1.5-15B-Thinker是一个150亿参数的开源多模态模型，通过精心设计的训练而非单纯扩大规模，实现了前沿性能。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 旨在通过高效的训练设计而非大规模参数来提升多模态推理能力，使资源有限的组织也能接触到前沿技术。

Method: 采用渐进式三阶段方法：1. 深度扩展以增强推理能力；2. 分阶段持续预训练，先建立基础的文本和视觉理解，然后利用针对性的合成数据（空间结构、组合理解、细粒度感知）增强视觉推理；3. 使用包含明确推理过程的高质量文本数据进行监督微调（数学、编码、科学、工具使用）。

Result: 在人工智能分析指数上获得52分，与DeepSeek-R1-0528相当，但计算资源消耗更少。在10个图像基准测试中，平均得分与Gemini-2.5-Flash和Claude Sonnet-3.7的差距在5分以内。在单GPU部署限制下实现了此性能。

Conclusion: 精心设计的模型中期训练可以有效缩小能力差距，无需大规模扩展，使前沿多模态推理更易于基础设施受限的组织获得。模型检查点、训练方法和评估协议已根据MIT许可证发布，以促进开源研究。

Abstract: We present Apriel-1.5-15B-Thinker, a 15-billion parameter open-weights
multimodal reasoning model that achieves frontier-level performance through
training design rather than sheer scale. Starting from Pixtral-12B, we apply a
progressive three-stage methodology: (1) depth upscaling to expand reasoning
capacity without pretraining from scratch, (2) staged continual pre-training
that first develops foundational text and vision understanding, then enhances
visual reasoning through targeted synthetic data generation addressing spatial
structure, compositional understanding, and fine-grained perception, and (3)
high-quality text-only supervised fine-tuning on curated instruction-response
pairs with explicit reasoning traces spanning mathematics, coding, science, and
tool use. Notably, our model achieves competitive results without reinforcement
learning or preference optimization, isolating the contribution of our
data-centric continual pre-training approach. On the Artificial Analysis
Intelligence Index, Apriel-1.5-15B-Thinker attains a score of 52, matching
DeepSeek-R1-0528 despite requiring significantly fewer computational resources.
Across ten image benchmarks, its performance is on average within five points
of Gemini-2.5-Flash and Claude Sonnet-3.7, a key achievement for a model
operating within single-GPU deployment constraints. Our results demonstrate
that thoughtful mid-training 2 design can close substantial capability gaps
without massive scale, making frontier-level multimodal reasoning accessible to
organizations with limited infrastructure. We release the model checkpoint, all
training recipes, and evaluation protocols under the MIT license to to advance
open-source research.

</details>


### [235] [Generalized Parallel Scaling with Interdependent Generations](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.01143)
*Harry Dong,David Brandfonbrener,Eryk Helenowski,Yun He,Mrinal Kumar,Han Fang,Yuejie Chi,Karthik Abinav Sankararaman*

Main category: cs.AI

TL;DR: Bridge通过生成相互依赖的响应，打破了并行LLM推理中响应孤立的局面，提高了响应质量和一致性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有的并行LLM推理方法将N个响应视为独立的，未能利用生成过程中的潜在信息，导致计算资源碎片化。

Method: Bridge通过将批处理的LLM隐藏状态视为整体张量而非独立切片，生成相互依赖的响应。该模型仅引入少量新增参数（2.8%-5.1%）。

Result: Bridge将通过可验证奖励进行强化学习的相对平均准确度提高了高达50%，并提高了正确响应的一致性。它可扩展到任何生成宽度，且性能优于独立生成。

Conclusion: Bridge实现了一种更通用的并行扩展模式，能够有效利用序列间的有价值信息，与任何后处理聚合技术兼容。

Abstract: Parallel LLM inference scaling involves sampling a set of $N>1$ responses for
a single input prompt. However, these $N$ parallel responses tend to be
generated independently from each other, partitioning compute resources and
leaving potentially useful information in one generation untapped by others.
This is in contrast to response length scaling where past computation is used
in all future steps. For higher quality responses and response sets, we propose
Bridge to generate interdependent responses in parallel by rethinking batched
LLM hidden states as holistic tensors rather than independent slices. With only
a small amount (2.8%-5.1%) of new parameters, Bridge improves the relative mean
accuracy gains from reinforcement learning with verifiable rewards by up to 50%
and boosts consistency of correct responses. Trained once, Bridge scales to any
generation width, all with greater performance than independent generations,
unlocking a more general mode of parallel scaling that effectively leverages
information between sequences, compatible with any post-generation aggregation
technique.

</details>


<div id='eess.SY'></div>

# eess.SY [[Back]](#toc)

### [236] [Robust Attitude Control of Nonlinear Multi-Rotor Dynamics with LFT Models and $\mathcal{H}_\infty$ Performance](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.00208)
*Tanay Kumar,Raktim Bhattacharya*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 本文比较了H_inf和PID控制器在无人机姿态稳定中的应用，H_inf控制器在风扰和陀螺仪噪声下表现更优。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 无人机在不确定环境中姿态稳定面临非线性动力学、参数变化和传感器限制等挑战。

Method: 使用线性参数变化（LPV）框架建模飞行动力学，并通过H_inf和PID控制器进行比较研究，H_inf控制器仅使用陀螺仪测量值进行设计。

Result: H_inf控制器在模拟中相比PID控制器在恶劣风扰下表现出显著的姿态调节改进。

Conclusion: H_inf控制器在无人机姿态稳定方面优于PID控制器，尤其是在存在风扰和传感器噪声的情况下。

Abstract: Attitude stabilization of unmanned aerial vehicles in uncertain environments
presents significant challenges due to nonlinear dynamics, parameter
variations, and sensor limitations. This paper presents a comparative study of
$\mathcal{H}_\infty$ and classical PID controllers for multi-rotor attitude
regulation in the presence of wind disturbances and gyroscope noise. The flight
dynamics are modeled using a linear parameter-varying (LPV) framework, where
nonlinearities and parameter variations are systematically represented as
structured uncertainties within a linear fractional transformation formulation.
A robust controller based on $\mathcal{H}_\infty$ formulation is designed using
only gyroscope measurements to ensure guaranteed performance bounds. Nonlinear
simulation results demonstrate the effectiveness of the robust controllers
compared to classical PID control, showing significant improvement in attitude
regulation under severe wind disturbances.

</details>


### [237] [Combined Learning and Control: A New Paradigm for Optimal Control with Unknown Dynamics](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.00308)
*Panagiotis Kounatidis,Andreas A. Malikopoulos*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 该论文提出了一种结合学习和控制（CLC）的新方法，用于解决具有未知动态的优化控制问题，该方法整合了基于模型的控制和数据驱动的学习。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 为了解决具有未知动态的优化控制问题，提出了一种新的方法。

Method: 提出了一种结合学习和控制（CLC）的方法，该方法通过统一基于模型的控制和数据驱动的学习来解决优化控制问题。其核心思想是设计一个控制器，使其对于基于可用模型的代理目标最优，同时惩罚与实际系统的匹配度，从而使控制器对于实际系统也最优。在CLC的基础上，论文对线性二次调节器问题进行了研究，并取得了三项进展：（1）证明了CLC惩罚是特定阶段的权重序列，而不是一个恒定的值；（2）确定了何时可以预先设定这些权重，何时必须根据（未知的）动态来设定；（3）开发了一个轻量级的学习循环，可以直接从数据中调整权重，同时保留基于模型的设计的优点。

Result: 论文提供了一个完整的算法和针对常见基线方法的实证研究。结果阐明了先验知识在何处足够，以及在何处学习至关重要。

Conclusion: CLC 方法作为经典最优控制和现代学习方法之间的实际的、有理论基础的桥梁。

Abstract: In this paper, we present the combined learning-and-control (CLC) approach,
which is a new way to solve optimal control problems with unknown dynamics by
unifying model-based control and data-driven learning. The key idea is simple:
we design a controller to be optimal for a proxy objective built on an
available model while penalizing mismatches with the real system, so that the
resulting controller is also optimal for the actual system. Building on the
original CLC formulation, we demonstrate the framework to the linear quadratic
regulator problem and make three advances: (i) we show that the CLC penalty is
a sequence of stage-specific weights rather than a single constant; (ii) we
identify when these weights can be set in advance and when they must depend on
the (unknown) dynamics; and (iii) we develop a lightweight learning loop that
tunes the weights directly from data without abandoning the benefits of a
model-based design. We provide a complete algorithm and an empirical study
against common baseline methods. The results clarify where prior knowledge
suffices and where learning is essential, and they position CLC as a practical,
theoretically grounded bridge between classical optimal control and modern
learning methods.

</details>


### [238] [MM-LMPC: Multi-Modal Learning Model Predictive Control via Bandit-Based Mode Selection](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.00410)
*Wataru Hashimoto,Kazumune Hashimoto*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: MM-LMPC通过聚类轨迹到不同模式并使用基于带土的元控制器来探索和利用，以克服LMPC在迭代任务中的局限性。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: LMPC在迭代任务中虽然有效，但严重依赖初始轨迹，可能导致状态空间探索不充分，错过全局最优解。

Method: MM-LMPC将过去的轨迹聚类成不同的模式，并为每个模式维护特定的终端集和价值函数。一个基于带土的元控制器使用LCB策略来平衡模式间的探索和利用，从而系统地优化所有模式。

Result: MM-LMPC能够逃离高成本的局部最优解，发现全局最优解，并实现了递归可行性、闭环稳定性和渐近收敛到最佳模式，同时具有对数悔恨界。

Conclusion: MM-LMPC通过多模态方法解决了LMPC的局限性，在障碍物规避任务的模拟中验证了其性能改进。

Abstract: Learning Model Predictive Control (LMPC) improves performance on iterative
tasks by leveraging data from previous executions. At each iteration, LMPC
constructs a sampled safe set from past trajectories and uses it as a terminal
constraint, with a terminal cost given by the corresponding cost-to-go. While
effective, LMPC heavily depends on the initial trajectories: states with high
cost-to-go are rarely selected as terminal candidates in later iterations,
leaving parts of the state space unexplored and potentially missing better
solutions. For example, in a reach-avoid task with two possible routes, LMPC
may keep refining the initially shorter path while neglecting the alternative
path that could lead to a globally better solution. To overcome this
limitation, we propose Multi-Modal LMPC (MM-LMPC), which clusters past
trajectories into modes and maintains mode-specific terminal sets and value
functions. A bandit-based meta-controller with a Lower Confidence Bound (LCB)
policy balances exploration and exploitation across modes, enabling systematic
refinement of all modes. This allows MM-LMPC to escape high-cost local optima
and discover globally superior solutions. We establish recursive feasibility,
closed-loop stability, asymptotic convergence to the best mode, and a
logarithmic regret bound. Simulations on obstacle-avoidance tasks validate the
performance improvements of the proposed method.

</details>


### [239] [Modeling and Mixed-Integer Nonlinear MPC of Positive-Negative Pressure Pneumatic Systems](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.00433)
*Yu Mei,Xinyu Zhou,Xiaobo Tan*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 该研究提出了一种基于模型的控制框架，通过结合物理模型和混合整数非线性模型预测控制器（MI-NMPC）来解决软体机器人气动阀门控制中的非线性、振荡和方向依赖性问题。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 为软体机器人的正负压调控提供一种精确、高效且节能的控制方法，克服现有技术中存在的复杂非线性、振荡和方向依赖性等挑战。

Method: 提出一种物理模型，该模型考虑了软体机器人的充气/排气模式切换的非线性特性。在此基础上，设计了一个混合整数非线性模型预测控制器（MI-NMPC），该控制器能够联合优化模式切换和脉宽调制（PWM）输入，以实现精确的参考跟踪，同时满足输入约束并最小化能量消耗和开关次数。为了简化离散模式决策，采用组合积分近似（CIA）方法，将二元模式变量松弛为连续变量。

Result: 仿真结果表明，所提出的MI-NMPC控制框架在处理阶跃和正弦参考信号时，能够在精度、控制努力和切换次数之间取得良好的折衷，并且优于传统的PID和采用启发式模式选择的NMPC方法。

Conclusion: 所提出的基于MI-NMPC的控制框架能够有效地解决软体机器人气动驱动中的挑战，实现精确、高效和节能的控制。

Abstract: Positive-negative pressure regulation is critical to soft robotic actuators,
enabling large motion ranges and versatile actuation modes. However, it remains
challenging due to complex nonlinearities, oscillations, and
direction-dependent, piecewise dynamics introduced by affordable pneumatic
valves and the bidirectional architecture. We present a model-based control
framework that couples a physics-grounded switched nonlinear plant model
(inflation/deflation modes) with a mixed-integer nonlinear model predictive
controller (MI-NMPC). The controller co-optimizes mode scheduling and PWM
inputs to realize accurate reference tracking while enforcing input constraints
and penalizing energy consumption and excessive switching. To make discrete
mode decisions tractable, we employ a Combinatorial Integral Approximation that
relaxes binary mode variables to continuous surrogates within the
valve-scheduling layer. With parameters identified from the physical system,
simulations with step and sinusoidal references validate the proposed MI-NMPC,
showing a consistently favorable trade-off among accuracy, control effort, and
switching, and outperforming conventional PID and NMPC with heuristic mode
selection.

</details>


### [240] [Four-Port Probe Stations and SOLR Calibration Standard Design up to 125 GHz on 28 nm CMOS](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.00435)
*Dipankar Shakya,Theodore S. Rappaport,Ethan Shieh,Michael E. Knox,Hamed Rahmani,Davood Shahrjerdi,Mingjun Ying,Kimberley Fan,Matt Lu,Andrej Rumiantsev,Vince Mallette,Gavin Fisher,Giancarlo De Chirico,Pratik Ghate,Shean McMahon*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 本文介绍了FFI和MPI公司开发的四端口探针台以及高达125 GHz的四端口校准标准设计。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 未来多频段无线设备需要真正的四端口探测以支持多个天线和射频链路。

Method: 设计了一个利用UMC 28 nm CMOS工艺的片上SOLR校准标准。使用虚拟多线TRL校准提取S/O/L标准S参数，并通过仿真验证SOLR校准性能。

Result: 实现了FFI和MPI的四端口探针台，并设计了高达125 GHz的SOLR校准标准，仿真结果验证了其性能。

Conclusion: FFI和MPI的新型探测解决方案以及SOLR校准标准为宽频率范围内的精确射频特性表征提供了新的机会。

Abstract: This paper presents two innovative four-port probe stations developed by
FormFactor Incorporated (FFI) and MPI Corporation (MPI), and a four-port
calibration standard design up to 125 GHz for the probe stations. True
four-port probing at mmWave and beyond does not yet exist, but is anticipated
for future multi-band wireless devices using several antennas and RF chains.
The four-port probe stations are housed in the THz measurement facility at NYU
and allow simultaneous probing from East, West, North, and South orientations,
which presents challenges for calibration. An on-chip
Short-Open-Load-Reciprocal (SOLR) calibration (cal) standard is designed
leveraging UMC's 28 nm CMOS process. S/O/L standard S-parameters are extracted
using a virtual multiline Thru-Reflect-Line (mTRL) cal and used to validate
SOLR cal performance via simulations up to 125 GHz. The novel probing solutions
from MPI and FFI, along with the SOLR cal, open up considerable opportunities
for precise RF characterization across wide frequency ranges.

</details>


### [241] [An Interpolation-based Scheme for Rapid Frequency-Domain System Identification](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.00525)
*Jared Jonas,Bassam Bamieh*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 提出了一种基于重心配点插值和权重优化的频域系统辨识方法，该方法与AAA算法相关，但具有自适应选择频率点的特点，特别适用于单次正弦响应成本高昂的系统。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 当单次正弦响应运行时间长或成本高昂时，为了减少运行总次数，需要一种有效的系统辨识方法。

Method: 提出了一种基于重心配点插值和权重优化的频域系统辨识方法。该方法利用正弦响应中的瞬态数据来优化重心配点权重，并基于误差准则（分别作为$H^2$和$H^elate^elate$范数的代理）自适应地选择下一个频率点。所提出的优化问题是凸的，并且可以保证辨识系统的稳定性。

Result: 计算结果表明，该方法在一种高阶、弱阻尼结构系统上具有有效性。

Conclusion: 所提出的基于重心配点插值和权重优化的频域系统辨识方法，通过自适应地选择频率点和利用瞬态数据，能够有效减少系统辨识所需的正弦响应运行次数，并可保证系统的稳定性。

Abstract: We present a frequency-domain system identification scheme based on
barycentric interpolation and weight optimization. The scheme is related to the
Adaptive Antoulas-Anderson (AAA) algorithm for model reduction, but uses an
adaptive algorithm for selection of frequency points for interrogating the
system response, as would be required in identification versus model reduction.
The scheme is particularly suited for systems in which any one sinusoidal
response run is long or expensive, and thus there is an incentive to reduce the
total number of such runs. Two key features of our algorithm are the use of
transient data in sinusoidal runs to both optimize the barycentric weights, and
automated next-frequency selection on an adaptive grid. Both are done with
error criteria that are proxies for a system's $H^2$ and $H^\infty$ norms
respectively. Furthermore, the optimization problem we formulate is convex, and
can optionally guarantee stability of the identified system. Computational
results on a high-order, lightly damped structural system highlights the
efficacy of this scheme.

</details>


### [242] [Development and Field Validation of a Fully Customised Vehicle Scanning System on Two Full-Scale Bridges](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.00560)
*A. Calderon Hurtado,J. Xu,R. Salleh,D. Dias-da-Costa,M. Makki Alamdari*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 使用专用的无人驾驶检测车辆和无监督学习框架，为桥梁进行非接触式健康监测。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 桥梁结构健康监测对于基础设施安全和可持续性至关重要。传统的监测方法成本高昂且难以扩展。本研究旨在开发一种更具成本效益和可扩展性的替代方案，即通过车载传感器进行非接触式桥梁健康监测（ISHM）。

Method: 本研究介绍了一种专门为路测桥梁检测设计的、首个专用电动检测车辆。该平台能够以恒定的低速行驶并提供可定制的操作参数，以最大化间接传感的准确性和可重复性。研究将该车辆部署在ISHM框架内，并在两个全尺寸桥梁上进行了测试，以评估其捕获桥梁结构动力响应的有效性。随后，采用两个无监督框架分析收集到的数据，以识别指示桥梁特性和结构状况的特征。

Result: 该车辆在两个全尺寸桥梁上的测试表明，其能够有效捕获桥梁的结构动力响应。无监督学习框架成功地从收集的数据中识别出了指示桥梁特性的特征。

Conclusion: 本研究证明了使用专用的无人驾驶检测车辆和无监督学习框架进行路测桥梁健康监测的可行性。该方法具有成本效益高、可扩展性强的优点，有望成为未来桥梁监测和维护的有效工具，从而提高安全性、优化维护策略并延长关键基础设施的寿命。

Abstract: Ensuring the structural integrity of bridges is essential for maintaining
infrastructure safety and promoting long-term sustainability. In this context,
Indirect Structural Health Monitoring (ISHM) through drive-by bridge inspection
emerges as a promising alternative to traditional inspection methods, offering
a cost-effective and scalable solution by using vehicle-mounted sensors to
assess the condition of bridges without requiring direct instrumentation. This
study introduces the first purpose-built electric inspection vehicle
specifically designed for drive-by bridge inspection. The autonomous platform
is capable of maintaining a constant low speed and offers customisable
operational parameters to maximise the accuracy and repeatability of indirect
sensing, capabilities not achieved in previous studies. The vehicle is deployed
within an ISHM framework and tested on two full-scale bridges to evaluate its
effectiveness in capturing structural dynamic responses. Two unsupervised
frameworks are then employed to analyse the collected data to identify features
indicative of bridge properties and structural condition. The promising
findings from this study demonstrate the practical feasibility of the approach.
The study also shows the potential of ISHM as a viable tool for efficient
bridge monitoring, contributing to the development of next-generation
structural health monitoring systems that can enhance safety, optimise
maintenance strategies, and support the longevity of critical infrastructure.

</details>


### [243] [Formation Control via Rotation Symmetry Constraints](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.00676)
*Zamir Martinez,Daniel Zelazo*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 提出了一种仅基于旋转对称性约束的多智能体系统分布式编队控制策略。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 该研究的动机是提出一种能够实现多智能体系统分布式编队控制的策略，该策略仅依赖于旋转对称性约束。

Method: 提出了一种势函数，强制执行智能体间的旋转对称性，其梯度定义了将智能体驱动到期望的对称且平面的配置的控制律。证明了仅需要（n-1）条边（最小连通性要求）即可实现该控制策略。进一步通过设计来解决机动问题，使编队能够沿着预定义的虚拟轨迹进行协调的平移、旋转和缩放。

Result: 数值模拟证明了所提出方法在实现对称编队和处理机动问题方面的有效性和灵活性。

Conclusion: 所提出的基于旋转对称性约束的分布式编队控制策略能够有效地实现期望的对称和平面配置，并且能够处理机动问题，实现协调的运动。

Abstract: We present a distributed formation control strategy for multi-agent systems
based only on rotation symmetry constraints. We propose a potential function
that enforces inter-agent \textbf{rotational} symmetries, with its gradient
defining the control law driving the agents toward a desired symmetric and
planar configuration. We show that only $(n-1)$ edges, the minimal connectivity
requirement, are sufficient to implement the control strategy, where $n$ is the
number of agents. We further augment the design to address the
\textbf{maneuvering problem}, enabling the formation to undergo coordinated
translations, rotations, and scalings along a predefined virtual trajectory.
Numerical simulations demonstrate the effectiveness and flexibility of the
proposed method.

</details>


### [244] [Uncertainty-Aware Flexibility of Buildings: From Quantification to Provision](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.00858)
*Julie Rousseau,Hanmin Cai,Philipp Heer,Kristina Orehounig,Gabriela Hug*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 该论文提出了一种考虑不确定性的建筑灵活性量化方法，并引入实时反馈机制以提高灵活性和收益，同时强调了考虑不确定性的必要性，以避免用户不适。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 为了解决建筑热模型不准确和环境天气预报不确定性导致预测建筑灵活性潜力的问题，提出了一种不确定性感知的灵活性量化方法。

Method: 使用机会约束公式化来量化不确定性，并引入仿射反馈策略来模拟实时反馈，以适应量化过程。

Result: 引入仿射反馈策略可以提高灵活性和收益。考虑不确定性对于灵活性量化是必要的，尤其是在没有日内交易的情况下。忽视不确定性可能导致显著的热不适。

Conclusion: 提出了一种考虑不确定性和用户舒适度的经济灵活性收益公平比较方法。

Abstract: Buildings represent a promising flexibility source to support the integration
of renewable energy sources, as they may shift their heating energy consumption
over time without impacting users' comfort. However, a building's predicted
flexibility potential is based on uncertain ambient weather forecasts and a
typically inaccurate building thermal model. Hence, this paper presents an
uncertainty-aware flexibility quantifier using a chance-constrained
formulation. Because such a quantifier may be conservative, we additionally
model real-time feedback in the quantification, in the form of affine feedback
policies. Such adaptation can take the form of intra-day trades or rebound
around the flexibility provision period. To assess the flexibility
quantification formulations, we further assume that flexible buildings
participate in secondary frequency control markets. The results show some
increase in flexibility and revenues when introducing affine feedback policies.
Additionally, it is demonstrated that accounting for uncertainties in the
flexibility quantification is necessary, especially when intra-day trades are
not available. Even though an uncertainty-ignorant potential may seem
financially profitable in secondary frequency control markets, it comes at the
cost of significant thermal discomfort for inhabitants. Hence, we suggest a
comfort-preserving approach, aiming to truly reflect thermal discomfort on the
economic flexibility revenue, to obtain a fairer comparison.

</details>


### [245] [TubeDAgger: Reducing the Number of Expert Interventions with Stochastic Reach-Tubes](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.00906)
*Julian Lemmel,Manuel Kranzl,Adam Lamine,Philipp Neubauer,Radu Grosu,Sophie A. Neubauer*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 使用随机可达集来减少交互式模仿学习中的专家干预次数。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 交互式模仿学习旨在通过在线方式从专家演示中训练新手策略。现有的DAgger算法通过在与环境交互和重新训练网络之间交替来训练稳健的新手策略。许多变体存在，它们在区分何时允许新手行动或将控制权交还给专家的方法上有所不同。

Method: 提出使用随机可达集（在验证动力学系统中很常见）作为估计专家干预必要性的新方法。

Result: 该方法无需为每个环境微调决策阈值，并且能够有效减少专家干预的次数，特别是在与使用疑问分类模型的相关方法相比时。

Conclusion: 随机可达集是一种新颖有效的方法，可以减少交互式模仿学习中的专家干预次数。

Abstract: Interactive Imitation Learning deals with training a novice policy from
expert demonstrations in an online fashion. The established DAgger algorithm
trains a robust novice policy by alternating between interacting with the
environment and retraining of the network. Many variants thereof exist, that
differ in the method of discerning whether to allow the novice to act or return
control to the expert. We propose the use of stochastic reachtubes - common in
verification of dynamical systems - as a novel method for estimating the
necessity of expert intervention. Our approach does not require fine-tuning of
decision thresholds per environment and effectively reduces the number of
expert interventions, especially when compared with related approaches that
make use of a doubt classification model.

</details>


### [246] [Accurate Small-Signal Modeling of Digitally Controlled Buck Converters with ADC-PWM Synchronization](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.00943)
*Hang Zhou,Yuxin Yang,Branislav Hrezdak,John Edward Fletcher*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 该论文提出了一个精确的数字控制降压变换器的全阶小信号模型，考虑了DPWM-ADC同步，并导出了数字环路增益的闭式解，用于简化补偿器设计和稳定性评估。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 为了精确跟踪稳态平均值，通常在数字控制的功率电子转换器中，采用DPWM-ADC同步来获取反馈信号（如电感电流）。然而，同步的小信号影响尚未得到研究。

Method: 本文提出了一个精确的小信号模型，该模型基于采样数据框架，显式考虑了DPWM-ADC同步，并捕捉了采样过程引入的所有侧带效应。数字环路增益使用改进的z变换以闭式形式推导得出。

Result: 该模型能够精确预测模拟和数字环路增益，即使在高于开关和采样频率的频率下也能如此。数字环路增益的闭式解简化了补偿器设计和稳定性评估。模拟和实验结果验证了模型的有效性。

Conclusion: 所提出的模型为数字控制转换器提供了精确的小信号分析，并且通过闭式解形式的数字环路增益，为控制器设计和稳定性分析提供了一种简化的方法。

Abstract: Digital control has become increasingly widespread in modern power electronic
converters. When acquiring feedback signals such as the inductor current,
synchronizing the analog-to-digital converter (ADC) with the digital
pulse-width modulator (DPWM) is commonly employed to accurately track their
steady-state average. However, the small-signal implications of such
synchronization have not been investigated. This paper presents an exact
small-signal model for digitally controlled buck converters operating in forced
continuous-conduction mode (FCCM) under constant-frequency current-mode
control, explicitly accounting for DPWM-ADC synchronization. Using a
sampled-data framework, the proposed model captures all sideband effects
introduced by the sampling process, yielding precise predictions of both analog
and digital loop gains, even at frequencies beyond the switching and sampling
frequencies. Both asymmetrical and symmetrical carrier modulations are
considered. Furthermore, the digital loop gain is derived in closed form using
the modified z-transform, enabling low-complexity compensator design and
stability assessment. Within this framework, the analog loop gain can be
directly obtained from the digital loop gain, thereby eliminating the need for
computationally intensive infinite series evaluations. The validity of the
proposed model is confirmed through both simulation and experimental results.

</details>


### [247] [Structuring Automotive Data for Systems Engineering: A Taxonomy-Based Approach](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.00963)
*Carl Philipp Hohl,Philipp Reis,Tobias Schürmann,Stefan Otten,Eric Sax*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 汽车行业数据碎片化，影响数据驱动的研发和优化。本文提出数据分类法，提高数据可及性，发现实际驾驶和机器学习数据需求增长，但需求工程数据缺乏。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 当前汽车行业数据收集分散、格式不统一，导致数据孤岛、重复工作和低效集成，阻碍了数据驱动的开发和优化。本研究旨在解决这些挑战。

Method: 通过结构化文献综述，开发归纳式分类法，按照数据来源和应用对汽车数据进行分类。

Result: 分析显示，实际驾驶数据和机器学习应用日益受到重视，但需求工程领域的数据可用性存在明显不足。该分类法提高了数据的可及性和利用率。

Conclusion: 本研究提出的结构化汽车数据框架有助于改进数据管理，提升汽车行业的决策效率。

Abstract: Vehicle data is essential for advancing data-driven development throughout
the automotive lifecycle, including requirements engineering, design,
verification, and validation, and post-deployment optimization. Developers
currently collect data in a decentralized and fragmented manner across
simulations, test benches, and real-world driving, resulting in data silos,
inconsistent formats, and limited interoperability. This leads to redundant
efforts, inefficient integration, and suboptimal use of data. This
fragmentation results in data silos, inconsistent storage structures, and
limited interoperability, leading to redundant data collection, inefficient
integration, and suboptimal application. To address these challenges, this
article presents a structured literature review and develops an inductive
taxonomy for automotive data. This taxonomy categorizes data according to its
sources and applications, improving data accessibility and utilization. The
analysis reveals a growing emphasis on real-world driving and machine learning
applications while highlighting a critical gap in data availability for
requirements engineering. By providing a systematic framework for structuring
automotive data, this research contributes to more efficient data management
and improved decision-making in the automotive industry.

</details>


### [248] [Real-time Operation of Electric Autonomous Mobility-on-Demand System Considering Power System Regulation](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.00984)
*Lyuzhu Pan,Hongcai Zhang*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 该研究提出了一个用于电动自主出行即需（EAMoD）系统与电网进行实时协调的框架，以应对EAMoD充电可能对电网造成的潜在风险。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: EAMoD系统的大量充电可能影响电网运行，进而影响EAMoD系统的最优运行。为规避此风险，需要建立EAMoD系统与电网的协调框架。

Method: 1. 使用马尔可夫决策过程模型描述EAMoD车队的时空特性（包括服务、重新定位和充电）。2. 考虑快充和慢充桩配置，对EAMoD充电站的充电可达性进行建模。3. 电网调控模型为EAMoD系统提供实时充电调控约束，以防止过载和欠压。4. 提出一种基于分段线性近似动态规划和模型预测控制的算法，以解决EAMoD系统复杂决策空间带来的求解质量差的问题。

Result: 在曼哈顿和14节点配电网络进行的数值实验验证了所提出算法的有效性，并强调了系统协调的必要性。

Conclusion: 所提出的协调框架和算法能够有效管理EAMoD系统的充电行为，确保电网稳定运行，并实现EAMoD系统的最优运行。

Abstract: Electric autonomous mobility-on-demand (EAMoD) systems are emerging all over
the world. However, their potential swarm charging in depots may deteriorate
operation of the power system, further in turn affecting EAMoD system's optimal
operation. To prevent this latent risk, we develop a real-time coordination
framework for the EAMoD system and the power system. First, the
temporal-spatial characteristics of EAMoD fleets are fully described based on a
Markov decision process model, including serving trips, repositioning, and
charging. Second, charger accessibility of EAMoD depot charging is well modeled
as real-world configuration, wherein fast and slow charge piles are both
included. Third, the power system regulation model provides real-time charging
regulation constraints for EAMoD systems to prevent potential overload and
undervoltage. To address the poor solution quality attributed to the complex
decision space of the EAMoD system, this paper proposes a piecewise
linear-based approximate dynamic programming algorithm combined with model
predictive control. Numerical experiments in the Manhattan and a 14-node power
distribution network validate the effectiveness of the proposed algorithm and
underscore the necessity of system coordination.

</details>


### [249] [Optimal Pricing of Electric Vehicle Charging on Coupled Power-Transportation Network based on Generalized Sensitivity Analysis](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.00992)
*Lyuzhu Pan,Hongcai Zhang*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 电动汽车充电服务商的定价优化问题在耦合的电力-交通网络中具有挑战性，本文提出了一种广义的敏感性分析方法，通过捕捉充电需求对价格的梯度响应，并结合梯度下降算法，有效解决了该非凸且难解的问题，并验证了其在不同规模网络上的计算效率。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 电动汽车充电服务商需要优化充电价格以应对电力-交通网络条件，但传统的用户均衡模型导致问题计算困难。

Method: 提出一种广义的敏感性分析方法，以梯度形式捕捉充电需求对价格的响应，并设计了相应的梯度下降算法来求解定价问题。

Result: 数值实验证明了该算法在不同规模网络上的计算效率和可行性。

Conclusion: 所提出的方法能够有效解决电动汽车充电定价的优化问题，并有可能评估最优定价对大规模耦合网络运行性能的影响。

Abstract: In the last decade, charging service providers are emerging along with the
prevalence of electric vehicles. These providers need to strategically optimize
their charging prices to improve the profits considering operation conditions
of the coupled power-transportation network. However, the optimal pricing
problem generally involves the user equilibrium model, which leads to a
mathematical program with equilibrium constraints. As a result, the pricing
problem is non-convex and computationally intractable especially for
large-scale network. To address this challenge, we propose a generalized
sensitivity analysis approach for optimal pricing of electric vehicle charging
on coupled power-transportation network. Specifically, we adopt a sensitivity
analysis to capture the best response of charging demand to charging price in
the gradient form. Consequently, charging service providers can make pricing
decisions based on the gradient information instead of the conventional KKT
conditions of the user equilibrium model. We then propose a tailored gradient
descent algorithm to solve the whole pricing problem. The mathematical proof of
validity is given and the time complexity of the proposed algorithm is
theoretically polynomial. Numerical experiments on different scales of networks
verify the computational efficiency of the proposed algorithm, indicating its
potential in evaluating the impact of the optimal pricing on the operational
performance of large-scale coupled power-transportation network.

</details>


### [250] [A Model-Based Extended State Observer for Discrete-Time Linear Multivariable Systems](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.01007)
*Jinfeng Chen,Zhiqiang Gao,Qin Lin*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 该论文提出了一种用于离散时间线性多变量系统的模型类扩展状态观测器（MB-ESO）及其变体，用于同时估计多个干扰。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 提出MB-ESO及其变体，用于处理离散时间线性多变量系统中的多个干扰，特别是当干扰增益矩阵为非对角线时。

Method: 1. 提出MB-ESO及其变体，将多个干扰定义为扩展状态向量。 2. 利用MB-ESO与未知输入观测器（UIO）的联系，建立了MB-ESO及其变体在多变量系统中存在的条件（即干扰与被控输出之间不存在不变量零点）。 3. 证明了当观测器特征值置于原点且子系统解耦时，变体MB-ESO产生的干扰估计与UIO相同。 4. 分析了MB-ESO及其变体的误差特性，并推导了干扰估计误差的传递函数。

Result: MB-ESO及其变体的干扰估计误差可以随着观测器特征值和时间的推移而单调减小。

Conclusion: MB-ESO及其变体是一种有效的方法，可以用于离散时间线性多变量系统中的多干扰估计，并且其误差特性得到了很好的分析。

Abstract: A model-based extended state observer (MB-ESO) and its variant are proposed
for discrete-time linear multivariable systems, where multiple disturbances are
defined as an extended state vector in the same manner as in the original
formulation of ESO. The variant MB-ESO extends the MB-ESO to address cases
where the disturbance gain matrix is non-diagonal. Leveraging the connection
between the variant MB-ESO and the well-known unknown input observer (UIO), the
condition for the existence of a MB-ESO and its variant in multivariable
systems is established, for the first time, i.e., no invariant zeros exist
between the disturbances and the plant outputs. It is shown that, with the
observer eigenvalues all placed at the origin and the subsystems decoupled, the
variant MB-ESO produces the identical disturbance estimation as that of UIO.
Moreover, the error characteristics of MB-ESO and its variant are analyzed and
the transfer functions associated with the disturbance estimation errors are
derived. It is demonstrated both mathematically and in simulations that the
disturbance estimation error of MB-ESO decreases monotonically with respect to
both the observer eigenvalues and time.

</details>


### [251] [Gain-Scheduled Passive Fault-Tolerant Control Design for Dual-System UAV Transition Flight](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.01044)
*Junfeng Cai,Marco Lovera*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 本文提出了一种针对双动力系统垂直起降无人机的增益调度无源容错控制方法，该方法将执行器故障导致的控制有效性损失视为模型输入不确定性，并使用乘性不确定性描述来表示。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 确保双动力系统无人机在发生故障/失效后能维持安全飞行。

Method: 提出了一种增益调度的无源容错控制（PFTC）方法，将模型不确定性（由执行器故障/失效导致控制有效性损失引起）视为模型输入不确定性，并使用乘性不确定性描述来表示。

Result: 所提出的增益调度结构化无穷大（GS SHIF）PFTC系统在非线性六自由度模拟器上进行了验证，其容错性能优于LQR和结构化无穷大控制系统。

Conclusion: 所提出的GS SHIF PFTC方法能够有效地处理双动力系统无人机在转换飞行中的故障，并且相比现有方法，简化了控制综合过程，提高了设计效率。

Abstract: Dual-system UAVs with vertical take-off and landing capabilities have become
increasingly popular in recent years. As a safety-critical system, it is
important that a dual-system UAV can maintain safe flight after faults/failures
occur. This paper proposes a gain-scheduled passive fault-tolerant control
(PFTC) method for the transition flight of dual-system UAVs. In this novel FTC
design method, the model uncertainties arising from the loss of control
effectiveness caused by actuator faults/failures, for the first time, are
treated as model input uncertainty, allowing us to use multiplicative
uncertainty descriptions to represent it. The advantages of the proposed method
consist in significantly reducing the number of design points, thereby
simplifying the control synthesis process and improving the efficiency of
designing the FTC system for dual-system UAV transition flight compared with
the existing FTC design methods. As a general method, it can be applied to the
design of FTC systems with multiple uncertain parameters and multiple channels.
The developed passive FTC system is validated on a nonlinear
six-degree-of-freedom simulator. The simulation results demonstrate that the
gain-scheduled structured H infinity (GS SHIF) PFTC system provides superior
fault tolerance performance compared with the LQR and structured H infinity
control systems, thereby showcasing the effectiveness and the advantages of the
proposed GS SHIF PFTC approach.

</details>


### [252] [Grid Frequency Stability Support Potential of Data Center: A Quantitative Assessment of Flexibility](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.01050)
*Pengyu Ren,Wei Sun,Yifan Wang,Gareth Harrison*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 数据中心快速增长，增加了电力需求，但同时也提供了快速可控的灵活性。为了确保可靠运行，需要考虑需求侧频率响应来解决单位承诺问题。本文提出了一种基于决策树的约束学习的数据驱动线性化框架，将非线性频率约束嵌入混合整数线性规划中，以优化发电计划和数据中心的频率响应。研究表明，增加柔性直流负荷比例可以提高系统成本效益和可再生能源整合。然而，边际效益递减，因此引入了边际灵活性价值指标来量化额外灵活性的经济价值。随着数据中心成为系统负荷的更大组成部分，它们积极参与频率响应对于维持经济和安全的系统运行将变得越来越重要。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 数据中心快速增长，对电力系统动态产生了重大影响，增加了用电需求，但同时也能提供快速且可控的灵活性。为了在这些条件下确保电力系统的可靠运行，需要通过增强需求侧频率响应模型来解决频率约束下的单位承诺问题。

Method: 提出了一种基于决策树的约束学习的数据驱动线性化框架，将非线性的频率约束（例如，频率谷值约束）嵌入到混合整数线性规划（mixed-integer linear programming, MILP）中。这种方法使得对发电计划和数据中心快速频率响应进行可处理的优化成为可能。

Result: 通过在基准系统和包含更高直流电渗透率的 2030 年未来情景下的案例研究，证明了增加柔性直流负荷的比例可以持续提高系统成本效益并支持可再生能源的整合。然而，这种效益表现出边际收益递减的现象。此外，文章还提出了边际灵活性价值（Marginal Flexibility Value）指标，用于量化额外灵活性所带来的经济价值。

Conclusion: 随着数据中心在系统负荷中所占比例的增加，它们积极参与频率响应对于维护经济高效且安全的系统运行将变得越来越不可或缺。

Abstract: The rapid expansion of data center infrastructure is reshaping power system
dynamics by significantly increasing electricity demand while also offering
potential for fast and controllable flexibility. To ensure reliable operation
under such conditions, the frequency secured unit commitment problem must be
solved with enhanced modeling of demand side frequency response. In this work,
we propose a data-driven linearization framework based on decision tree based
constraint learning to embed nonlinear nadir frequency constraints into
mixed-integer linear programming. This approach enables tractable optimization
of generation schedules and fast frequency response from data centers. Through
case studies on both a benchmark system and a 2030 future scenario with higher
DC penetration, we demonstrate that increasing the proportion of flexible DC
load consistently improves system cost efficiency and supports renewable
integration. However, this benefit exhibits diminishing marginal returns,
motivating the introduction of the Marginal Flexibility Value metric to
quantify the economic value of additional flexibility. The results highlight
that as DCs become a larger share of system load, their active participation in
frequency response will be increasingly indispensable for maintaining both
economic and secure system operations.

</details>


### [253] [Predictive Control Barrier Functions for Discrete-Time Linear Systems with Unmodeled Delays](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.01059)
*Juan Augusto Paredes Salazar,James Usevitch,Ankit Goel*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 提出了一种预测控制屏障函数（PCBF）框架，用于解决具有未知相对阶的离散时间系统中的状态约束问题。该框架通过扩展预测范围来构建一个相对阶为一的关联系统的控制屏障函数，从而简化了约束执行并消除了对辅助函数的需求。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有的离散时间控制屏障函数（CBF）方法在相对阶大于一时需要构建辅助屏障函数，这会增加实现的复杂性并可能导致保守的安全集。本研究旨在解决这一挑战。

Method: 提出PCBF框架，通过扩展预测范围来构建一个相对阶为一的关联系统的控制屏障函数，使得PCBF的超水平集与其安全集一致。

Result: PCBF框架简化了约束执行，无需辅助函数。通过在具有输入延迟的离散时间双积分器和带位置约束的无人机（bicopter）系统上的实验证明了该方法的有效性。

Conclusion: PCBF框架为具有未知相对阶的离散时间系统提供了一种更简单有效的状态约束执行方法。

Abstract: This paper introduces a predictive control barrier function (PCBF) framework
for enforcing state constraints in discrete-time systems with unknown relative
degree, which can be caused by input delays or unmodeled input dynamics.
Existing discrete-time CBF formulations typically require the construction of
auxiliary barrier functions when the relative degree is greater than one, which
complicates implementation and may yield conservative safe sets. The proposed
PCBF framework addresses this challenge by extending the prediction horizon to
construct a CBF for an associated system with relative degree one. As a result,
the superlevel set of the PCBF coincides with the safe set, simplifying
constraint enforcement and eliminating the need for auxiliary functions. The
effectiveness of the proposed method is demonstrated on a discrete-time double
integrator with input delay and a bicopter system with position constraints.

</details>


### [254] [Safety-Critical Control via Recurrent Tracking Functions](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.01147)
*Jixian Liu,Enrique Mallada*

Main category: eess.SY

TL;DR: 该研究提出了一种名为循环跟踪函数（RTF）的新方法，用于解决高阶非线性系统安全关键控制器的合成问题。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 传统控制屏障函数（CBF）的合成对于高阶非线性系统来说计算上难以实现，并且需要单调递减的李亚普诺夫跟踪函数，而这种函数仅存在于全驱动系统中。此外，为低阶模型（RoMs）设计的CBF可能无法保证全阶模型（FoMs）的安全。本研究旨在克服这些限制。

Method: 该研究提出了一种基于分层控制的方法，在低阶模型（RoMs）中设计CBF，同时调节全阶模型（FoMs）的动力学。他们引入了循环跟踪函数（RTF），放宽了对李亚普诺夫跟踪函数单调递减的要求，代之以有限时间循环条件。这允许跟踪误差的瞬态偏差，同时保证安全。通过将CBF与RTF相结合，研究人员构建了循环CBF（RCBF），其零超水平集是控制$	au$-循环的。

Result: 研究人员通过理论分析和数值实验，证明了RTF的有效性以及所提出方法保证全阶模型（FoMs）安全的能力。RCBF的零超水平集是控制$	au$-循环的，这保证了当RTF满足时，所有初始状态在该集合内都是安全的。

Conclusion: 该研究提出了一种新颖的循环CBF（RCBF）方法，结合了分层控制和循环跟踪函数（RTF），为高阶非线性系统提供了一种可行的安全关键控制器合成途径。与传统的CBF相比，该方法通过放宽单调性要求，允许跟踪误差的瞬态偏差，从而提高了控制器的灵活性和适用性，并提供了理论安全保证。

Abstract: This paper addresses the challenge of synthesizing safety-critical
controllers for high-order nonlinear systems, where constructing valid Control
Barrier Functions (CBFs) remains computationally intractable. Leveraging
layered control, we design CBFs in reduced-order models (RoMs) while regulating
full-order models' (FoMs) dynamics at the same time. Traditional Lyapunov
tracking functions are required to decrease monotonically, but systematic
synthesis methods for such functions exist only for fully-actuated systems. To
overcome this limitation, we introduce Recurrent Tracking Functions (RTFs),
which replace the monotonic decay requirement with a weaker finite-time
recurrence condition. This relaxation permits transient deviations of tracking
errors while ensuring safety. By augmenting CBFs for RoMs with RTFs, we
construct recurrent CBFs (RCBFs) whose zero-superlevel set is control
$\tau$-recurrent, and guarantee safety for all initial states in such a set
when RTFs are satisfied. We establish theoretical safety guarantees and
validate the approach through numerical experiments, demonstrating RTFs'
effectiveness and the safety of FoMs.

</details>


<div id='cs.DS'></div>

# cs.DS [[Back]](#toc)

### [255] [One-Sided Local Crossing Minimization](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.00331)
*Grzegorz Gutowski,Maarten Löffler,Yuto Okada,Alexander Wolff*

Main category: cs.DS

TL;DR: 本文证实了一侧交叉最小化问题的 NP 难度的猜想，并证明了带有特定打破平局方案的中位数启发式算法具有 3 的近似比。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究了图论中最小化交叉数的问题，特别是其局部版本——最大每条边的交叉数，并证实了未加权一侧交叉最小化问题的 NP 难度猜想。

Method: 通过分析一侧交叉最小化问题的局部版本，并结合带有特定打破平局方案的中位数启发式算法进行证明。

Result: 证实了一侧交叉最小化问题的 NP 难度猜想，并证明了中位数启发式算法的近似比为 3。

Conclusion: 一侧交叉最小化问题是 NP 难的，并且中位数启发式算法在特定条件下具有良好的近似性能。

Abstract: Drawing graphs with the minimum number of crossings is a classical problem
that has been studied extensively. Many restricted versions of the problem have
been considered. For example, bipartite graphs can be drawn such that the two
sets in the bipartition of the vertex set are mapped to two parallel lines, and
the edges are drawn as straight-line segments. In this setting, the number of
crossings depends only on the ordering of the vertices on the two lines. Two
natural variants of the problem have been studied. In the one-sided case, the
order of the vertices on one of the two lines is given and fixed; in the
two-sided case, no order is given. Both cases are important subproblems in the
so-called Sugiyama framework for drawing layered graphs with few crossings, and
both turned out to be NP-hard. For the one-sided case, Eades and Wormald
[Algorithmica 1994] introduced the median heuristic and showed that it has an
approximation ratio of 3.
  In recent years, researchers have focused on a local version of crossing
minimization where the aim is not to minimize the total number of crossings but
the maximum number of crossings per edge. Kobayashi, Okada, and Wolff [SoCG
2025] investigated the complexity of local crossing minimization parameterized
by the natural parameter. They showed that the weighted one-sided problem is
NP-hard and conjectured that the unweighted one-sided case remains NP-hard. In
this work, we confirm their conjecture. We also prove that the median heuristic
with a specific tie-breaking scheme has an approximation ratio of 3.

</details>


### [256] [Differentially Private Learning of Exponential Distributions: Adaptive Algorithms and Tight Bounds](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.00790)
*Bar Mahpud,Or Sheffet*

Main category: cs.DS

TL;DR: We develop differentially private algorithms for learning exponential and Pareto distributions, achieving near-optimal sample complexity through adaptive strategies.


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: The goal is to privately estimate the parameter \lambda of exponential distributions and extend this to Pareto distributions under differential privacy, ensuring the learned distribution is close to the true one in total variation distance.

Method: Two pure DP algorithms are presented: one adapts the maximum likelihood estimator with clipping and Laplace noise, and the other uses the property that the (1-1/e)-quantile equals 1/\lambda. These are combined into an adaptive algorithm. The approach is extended to Pareto distributions via a logarithmic reduction. Approximate (\epsilon,\delta)-DP is also considered.

Result: The algorithms achieve near-optimal sample complexity for learning exponential distributions across different regimes. For Pareto distributions, nearly matching lower bounds are proven. The use of approximate DP simplifies the process by removing the need for external bounds.

Conclusion: The paper provides the first tight characterization of learning exponential distributions under differential privacy and demonstrates the effectiveness of adaptive strategies for heavy-tailed distributions.

Abstract: We study the problem of learning exponential distributions under differential
privacy. Given $n$ i.i.d.\ samples from $\mathrm{Exp}(\lambda)$, the goal is to
privately estimate $\lambda$ so that the learned distribution is close in total
variation distance to the truth. We present two complementary pure DP
algorithms: one adapts the classical maximum likelihood estimator via clipping
and Laplace noise, while the other leverages the fact that the
$(1-1/e)$-quantile equals $1/\lambda$. Each method excels in a different
regime, and we combine them into an adaptive best-of-both algorithm achieving
near-optimal sample complexity for all $\lambda$. We further extend our
approach to Pareto distributions via a logarithmic reduction, prove nearly
matching lower bounds using packing and group privacy \cite{Karwa2017FiniteSD},
and show how approximate $(\epsilon,\delta)$-DP removes the need for externally
supplied bounds. Together, these results give the first tight characterization
of exponential distribution learning under DP and illustrate the power of
adaptive strategies for heavy-tailed laws.

</details>


### [257] [Boundaried Kernelization via Representative Sets](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.00832)
*Leonid Antipov,Stefan Kratsch*

Main category: cs.DS

TL;DR: 该论文提出了针对图问题的随机多项式界限内核化算法，利用基于 the matroid 的技术来识别可约节点，实现了局部改进。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有参数化问题的多项式内核化仅在参数值较小且全局结构受到严格限制时才有效。为了解决此问题，论文提出了界限内核化（boundaried kernelization），仅需局部结构即可实现局部改进。

Method: 利用 Kratsch 和 Wahlstr"om 的基于 the matroid 的技术，为 	exttt{smultiwaycut}, 	exttt{dtmultiwaycut}, 	exttt{oddcycletransversal}, 和 	exttt{vertexcoveroct} 问题设计了随机多项式界限内核化算法。

Result: 为 	exttt{smultiwaycut}, 	exttt{dtmultiwaycut}, 	exttt{oddcycletransversal}, 和 	exttt{vertexcoveroct} 问题提供了随机多项式界限内核化，这些问题先前已有随机多项式内核化。

Conclusion: 基于 the matroid 的技术可以通过分离局部部分及其边界，在局部应用于图问题，从而实现界限内核化。

Abstract: A kernelization is an efficient algorithm that given an instance of a
parameterized problem returns an equivalent instance of size bounded by some
function of the input parameter value. It is quite well understood which
problems do or (conditionally) do not admit a kernelization where this size
bound is polynomial, a so-called polynomial kernelization. Unfortunately, such
polynomial kernelizations are known only in fairly restrictive settings where a
small parameter value corresponds to a strong restriction on the global
structure on the instance. Motivated by this, Antipov and Kratsch [WG 2025]
proposed a local variant of kernelization, called boundaried kernelization,
that requires only local structure to achieve a local improvement of the
instance, which is in the spirit of protrusion replacement used in
meta-kernelization [Bodlaender et al.\ JACM 2016]. They obtain polynomial
boundaried kernelizations as well as (unconditional) lower bounds for several
well-studied problems in kernelization.
  In this work, we leverage the matroid-based techniques of Kratsch and
Wahlstr\"om [JACM 2020] to obtain randomized polynomial boundaried
kernelizations for \smultiwaycut, \dtmultiwaycut, \oddcycletransversal, and
\vertexcoveroct, for which randomized polynomial kernelizations in the usual
sense were known before. A priori, these techniques rely on the global
connectivity of the graph to identify reducible (irrelevant) vertices.
Nevertheless, the separation of the local part by its boundary turns out to be
sufficient for a local application of these methods.

</details>


### [258] [Degree-bounded Online Bipartite Matching: OCS vs. Ranking](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.00965)
*Yilong Feng,Haolong Li,Xiaowei Wu,Shengwei Zhou*

Main category: cs.DS

TL;DR: 本文研究了在线二分匹配问题，分析了两种经典算法（Ranking和OCS）在(d,d)-有界图上的竞争比。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: Cohen和Wajc（2018）提出的算法在d-正则图上的竞争比对于d值较小时意义不大。本文旨在研究更一般的图类（(d,d)-有界图）以及两种经典算法的性能。

Method: 分析了Ranking和Online Correlated Selection (OCS) 两种算法在(d,d)-有界图上的竞争比。

Result: 对于固定的d>=2，OCS算法的竞争比至少为0.835，并且总高于Ranking算法。当d趋向无穷大时，OCS算法的竞争比至少为0.897，而Ranking算法至多为0.816。文章还对(k,d)-有界图进行了结果扩展。

Conclusion: OCS算法在(d,d)-有界图上表现优于Ranking算法，并且在d值较大时具有较高的竞争比。

Abstract: We revisit the online bipartite matching problem on $d$-regular graphs, for
which Cohen and Wajc (SODA 2018) proposed an algorithm with a competitive ratio
of $1-2\sqrt{H_d/d} = 1-O(\sqrt{(\log d)/d})$ and showed that it is
asymptotically near-optimal for $d=\omega(1)$. However, their ratio is
meaningful only for sufficiently large $d$, e.g., the ratio is less than
$1-1/e$ when $d\leq 168$. In this work, we study the problem on $(d,d)$-bounded
graphs (a slightly more general class of graphs than $d$-regular) and consider
two classic algorithms for online matching problems: \Ranking and Online
Correlated Selection (OCS). We show that for every fixed $d\geq 2$, the
competitive ratio of OCS is at least $0.835$ and always higher than that of
\Ranking. When $d\to \infty$, we show that OCS is at least $0.897$-competitive
while \Ranking is at most $0.816$-competitive. We also show some extensions of
our results to $(k,d)$-bounded graphs.

</details>


### [259] [Perfect Fractional Matchings in Bipartite Graphs Via Proportional Allocations](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.01107)
*Daniel Hathcock,R. Ravi*

Main category: cs.DS

TL;DR: Bipartite graphs with perfect matchings can have perfect proportional allocations if and only if they are matching covered. This is extended to non-matching-covered graphs.


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: The paper aims to understand the conditions for perfect proportional allocations in bipartite graphs and extend this understanding to graphs that are not necessarily matching covered.

Method: The study uses a classical result on matrix scaling to prove the main theorem. It also presents an extension for non-matching-covered graphs.

Result: A perfect proportional allocation exists in a bipartite graph with a perfect matching if and only if the graph is matching covered. An extension provides simple proportional allocations for non-matching-covered bipartite graphs.

Conclusion: The paper establishes a clear condition (matching covered) for the existence of perfect proportional allocations in bipartite graphs and offers a generalized solution for broader cases.

Abstract: Given a bipartite graph that has a perfect matching, a prefect proportional
allocation is an assignment of positive weights to the nodes of the right
partition so that every left node is fractionally assigned to its neighbors in
proportion to their weights, and these assignments define a fractional perfect
matching. We prove that a bipartite graph has a perfect proportional allocation
if and only if it is matching covered, by using a classical result on matrix
scaling. We also present an extension of this result to provide simple
proportional allocations in non-matching-covered bipartite graphs.

</details>

### [260] [Evaluating noises of boson sampling with statistical benchmark methods](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.00056)
*Yang Ji,Yongjin Ye,Qiao Wang,Shi Wang,Jie Hou,Yongzheng Wu,Zijian Wang,Bo Jiang*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 本研究提出了一种基于统计基准方法（如相关器和云）的量化评估博猫采样中噪声（光子部分可区分性和光子损耗补偿暗计数）的方法，以克服其缺乏自校正码的缺点，并为实现量子计算优势或执行特定任务提供依据。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 缺乏自校正码阻碍了大规模、高鲁棒性博猫采样的发展，因此，量化噪声水平对于实现量子计算优势或执行特定任务至关重要。

Method: 利用统计基准方法（如相关器和云）来量化评估光子部分可区分性和光子损耗补偿暗计数。其原理是噪声会抑制由多光子干涉产生的输出分布不平衡，并且使用高阶相关器或云可以提高评估性能。

Result: 研究表明，统计基准方法可以量化评估博猫采样中的噪声。

Conclusion: 统计基准方法不仅可用于区分博猫采样及其模拟器，也可用于量化评估博猫采样中的噪声。

Abstract: The lack of self-correcting codes hiders the development of boson sampling to
be large-scale and robust. Therefore, it is important to know the noise levels
in order to cautiously demonstrate the quantum computational advantage or
realize certain tasks. Based on those statistical benchmark methods such as the
correlators and the clouds, which are initially proposed to discriminate boson
sampling and other mockups, we quantificationally evaluate noises of photon
partial distinguishability and photon loss compensated by dark counts. This is
feasible owing to the fact that the output distribution unbalances are
suppressed by noises, which are actually results of multi-photon interferences.
This is why the evaluation performance is better when high order correlators or
corresponding clouds are employed. Our results indicate that the statistical
benchmark methods can also work in the task of evaluating noises of boson
sampling.

</details>


### [261] [Mathematical and numerical analysis of quantum signal processing](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.00443)
*Lin Lin*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: QSP是一种表示标量多项式的方法，是QSVT等重要量子算法的基础，本文综述了QSP在超越多项式、相位因子计算复杂度和数值稳定性方面的最新进展。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: QSVT作为一种重要的量子算法，其基础是量子信号处理（QSP），而QSP的表示依赖于标量多项式。因此，对QSP的数学和数值分析进行研究具有重要意义。

Method: 本文综述了量子信号处理（QSP）的最新进展，重点关注其超越多项式的推广、相位因子评估的计算复杂性以及相关算法的数值稳定性。研究方法涉及QSP、SU(2)上的非线性傅里叶分析、快速多项式乘法以及具有位移结构矩阵的高斯消元法之间的相互作用。

Result: 文章讨论了QSP的推广、相位因子评估的计算复杂性以及数值稳定性等问题，并提出了一些解决方案，这些解决方案源于QSP与非线性傅里叶分析、快速多项式乘法和高斯消元法之间的相互作用。

Conclusion: QSP作为QSVT的基础，在量子计算中有广泛应用。本文对QSP的数学和数值分析进行了综述，并探讨了其在超越多项式、计算复杂性和数值稳定性方面的前沿问题，揭示了其与其他数学工具的深刻联系。

Abstract: Quantum signal processing (QSP) provides a representation of scalar
polynomials of degree $d$ as products of matrices in $\mathrm{SU}(2)$,
parameterized by $(d+1)$ real numbers known as phase factors. QSP is the
mathematical foundation of quantum singular value transformation (QSVT), which
is often regarded as one of the most important quantum algorithms of the past
decade, with a wide range of applications in scientific computing, from
Hamiltonian simulation to solving linear systems of equations and eigenvalue
problems. In this article we survey recent advances in the mathematical and
numerical analysis of QSP. In particular, we focus on its generalization beyond
polynomials, the computational complexity of algorithms for phase factor
evaluation, and the numerical stability of such algorithms. The resolution to
some of these problems relies on an unexpected interplay between QSP, nonlinear
Fourier analysis on $\mathrm{SU}(2)$, fast polynomial multiplications, and
Gaussian elimination for matrices with displacement structure.

</details>


### [262] [Operator algebra of the information-disturbance tradeoff in quantum measurements](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.00064)
*Hollis Williams,Holger F. Hofmann*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 量子测量中的信息增益受到由扰动模式定义的紧密上限的约束。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 在量子测量中，信息增益和系统扰动之间的关系是一个关键问题。该研究旨在探讨信息增益和扰动之间的定量关系。

Method: 通过将描述信息增益的算子扩展为代表可区分扰动模式的酉算子集，并分析这些扰动模式的可观测量统计数据。

Result: 研究发现，由扰动模式的可观测量统计数据定义的上限，能够紧密地约束信息增益。

Conclusion: 量子测量中信息增益的多少受到其扰动模式的制约，该制约可以用一个紧密的上限来量化。

Abstract: Quantum measurements can be described by operators that assign conditional
probabilities to different outcomes while also describing unavoidable physical
changes to the system. Here, we point out that operators describing information
gain at minimal disturbance can be expanded into a set of unitary operators
representing experimentally distinguishable patterns of disturbance. The
observable statistics of disturbance defines a tight upper bound on the
information gain of the measurement.

</details>


### [263] [Passive detection of Schwinger boson dynamics via a qubit](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.00108)
*Ioannis Petrides,Arpit Arora,Prineha Narang*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 利用集成光子器件和超导电路中的跨蒙量子比特，提出一种用于传感时间反演破坏顺序的新型量子传感方案，适用于难以建立电学接触的材料。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 先进的量子传感技术，如超导电路和基于量子比特的系统，已经彻底改变了探索和理解量子物质基本性质的方法。本研究旨在提出一种新的集成光子器件，用于传感时间反演破坏顺序，特别是对于难以建立电学接触的材料。

Method: 提出一种集成光子器件，其中跨蒙量子比特与微波交叉谐振器电容耦合。该器件利用量子比特作为控制和探测元件，谐振器作为样品载体，实现非接触式光谱分析。

Result: 通过调谐量子比特与交叉谐振器的耦合强度和相位，可以精确控制相互作用动力学，实现高灵敏度检测。该方法可以紧凑地理解为基于受激态布居数和量子度量的演化。

Conclusion: 该集成光子器件架构有潜力承载广泛的量子现象，这些现象可以精确地编码在跨蒙量子比特的动力学中，从而可能揭示出关联材料中难以捉摸的方面。

Abstract: The quantum sensing landscape has been revolutionized by advanced
technologies like superconducting circuits and qubit-based systems which have
furthered the ability to probe and understand fundamental properties of quantum
matter. Here, we propose an integrated photonic device where a transmon qubit
capacitively couples to a microwave cross-resonator, and the setup is employed
for sensing of time reversal broken order in materials. In this sensing scheme,
the transmon qubit plays a dual role as both a control element and a passive
detector, while the photonic cross-resonator serves as the host for the sample,
enabling a contact-free spectroscopic method suitable for studying materials
where reliable electrical contacts are challenging to obtain, e.g., in van der
Waal 2D heterostructures. We show that by tuning the coupling strength and
phase between the transmon and the cross-resonator, the system allows selective
control over the interaction dynamics and leads to a highly sensitive detection
method that can be compactly understood in terms of evolution of excited state
population and quantum metric of the resonator-transmon hybrid state. This
architecture has the potential to host a wide range of quantum phenomena that
can be precisely encoded in the dynamics of the transmon qubit and, in this
way, potentially allows access to elusive aspects of correlated materials.

</details>


### [264] [Complexity and hardness of random peaked circuits](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.00132)
*Yuxuan Zhang*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 我们提出了一种生成随机峰值电路的方法，该方法在接近所有情况下都满足量子优势的三个要求（近期可行性、经典困难性和可验证性）。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 现有的量子优势方案大多无法满足量子优势的三个要求。本研究提出了一种生成随机峰值电路的方法，以解决这一问题。

Method: 首先，选择一个大小为多项式的随机电路 $C$，它构成一个 $k$-设计。然后，从同一架构中选择一个第二个随机电路 $C'$，但需要满足一个后选择标准：$C'$ 必须在某一行上与 $C$ 具有高重叠。

Result: 我们证明了这种方法生成的电路是重要的：$C'$ 明显区别于 $C^\dagger$。此外，$C'$ 具有非压缩性，电路复杂度为 $\tilde \Omega(nk)$。我们还证明了估计随机峰值电路的峰值是平均情况下的 #P-hard 问题。在某些假设下，没有经典算法能在多项式时间内达到逆多项式精度。最后，我们展示了这种方法可以用于可验证的量子优势协议。

Conclusion: 我们提出了一种生成随机峰值电路的新方法，并证明了该方法在理论上和实践上都能实现量子优势。该方法有望在近期可行性、经典困难性和可验证性方面取得突破。

Abstract: Near-term feasibility, classical hardness, and verifiability are the three
requirements for demonstrating quantum advantage; most existing quantum
advantage proposals achieve at most two. A promising candidate recently
proposed is through randomly generated peaked circuits. In this work, we study
an explicit construction for random peaked circuits: first selecting a random
circuit $C$ of polynomial size, which forms a $k$-design. Subsequently, a
second random circuit $C'$ is chosen from the same architecture, subject to a
postselection criterion: $C'$ must exhibit a high overlap with $C$ in one of
their rows. Utilizing unitary design properties, we demonstrate that the
circuits generated by this method are non-trivial; specifically, $C'$ is
provably far from $C^\dagger$. Indeed, with overwhelmingly high probability, a
random peaked circuit generated this way is non-compressible and is of circuit
complexity $\tilde \Omega(nk)$. This resolves an open problem posed by Aaronson
in 2022. Secondly, we analytically establish that estimating the peakedness of
a random peaked circuit to within a $2^{-\text{poly}(n)}$ additive error, is
average-case \#P-hard. When the additive error is relaxed to
$1/\text{poly}(n)$, we note that the worst-case scenario for this problem is
BQP-complete. Under widely accepted assumptions on random quantum circuits, we
identify a regime where no classical polynomial-time sequential simulator
attains inverse-polynomial additive accuracy on the peak on a non-negligible
fraction of instances. Thirdly, we study using peaked circuits as a practical
attempt for a verifiable quantum advantage protocol. While the postselection
method for generating peaked circuits could be costly, we demonstrate that
numerical search for $C'$ with randomized initialization successfully returns a
random peaked circuit, achieving the properties as theoretically predicted.

</details>


### [265] [Approximate Quantum State Preparation with Tree-Based Bayesian Optimization Surrogates](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.00145)
*Nicholas S. DiBrita,Jason Han,Younghyun Cho,Hengrui Luo,Tirthak Patel*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: CircuitTree是一种基于贝叶斯优化的框架，用于在近量子计算机上进行近似状态制备，通过层级分解策略优化参数，实现低资源消耗和高保真度。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 在近量子计算机上，需要构建参数化电路来复制目标量子态的输出分布，同时最小化资源开销。这对于只需要分布匹配的近量子算法尤其重要，但由于随机输出、有限电路深度和高维非光滑参数空间等因素，该任务具有挑战性。

Method: 提出了一种名为CircuitTree的代理模型指导优化框架，该框架基于具有树状模型的贝叶斯优化。该框架采用结构化的层级分解策略，将参数划分为与变分电路架构对齐的块，从而实现具有理论收敛保证的分布式和样本高效优化。

Result: 实验评估表明，CircuitTree在合成基准和变分任务上实现了低的总体变差和高的保真度，并且所需的电路深度明显优于现有方法。

Conclusion: CircuitTree框架通过层级分解策略和树状模型，能够有效地解决近量子计算机上近似状态制备的问题，实现了资源消耗和精度的优化。

Abstract: We study the problem of approximate state preparation on near-term quantum
computers, where the goal is to construct a parameterized circuit that
reproduces the output distribution of a target quantum state while minimizing
resource overhead. This task is especially relevant for near-term algorithms
where distributional matching suffices, but it is challenging due to stochastic
outputs, limited circuit depth, and a high-dimensional, non-smooth parameter
space. We propose CircuitTree, a surrogate-guided optimization framework based
on Bayesian Optimization with tree-based models, which avoids the scalability
and smoothness assumptions of Gaussian Process surrogates. Our framework
introduces a structured layerwise decomposition strategy that partitions
parameters into blocks aligned with variational circuit architecture, enabling
distributed and sample-efficient optimization with theoretical convergence
guarantees. Empirical evaluations on synthetic benchmarks and variational tasks
validate our theoretical insights, showing that CircuitTree achieves low total
variation distance and high fidelity while requiring significantly shallower
circuits than existing approaches.

</details>


### [266] [The non-stabilizerness cost of quantum state estimation](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.00157)
*Gabriele Lo Monaco,Salvatore Lorenzo,Luca Innocenti,Alessandro Ferraro,Mauro Paternostro,G. Massimo Palma*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 研究单设置量子态估计场景中实现信息完备性所需的非稳定器资源。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究单设置量子态估计场景中实现信息完备性所需的非稳定器资源，并将“魔法”和稳定器概念应用于量子计量学。

Method: 证明仅允许稳定器资源时，这些策略等同于稳定器基中的酉测量，并且从不可信息完备；证明加入T门可以扩大可及信息，且至少需要 ${2n}/{\log_2 3}$ 个T门才能实现信息完备性，而2n个T门就足够了。

Result: 使用T门可以实现信息完备性，并且提供了T门数量的必要和充分条件。揭示了纠缠结构与t-掺杂Clifford电路实现的测量信息能力之间的紧密联系。

Conclusion: 非稳定器资源（特别是T门）对于实现单设置量子态估计的信息完备性至关重要。

Abstract: We study the non-stabilizer resources required to achieve informational
completeness in single-setting quantum state estimation scenarios. We consider
fixed-basis projective measurements preceded by quantum circuits acting on
$n$-qubit input states, allowing ancillary qubits to increase retrievable
information. We prove that when only stabilizer resources are allowed, these
strategies are always informationally equivalent to projective measurements in
a stabilizer basis, and therefore never informationally complete, regardless of
the number of ancillas. We then show that incorporating $T$ gates enlarges the
accessible information. Specifically, we prove that at least ${2n}/{\log_2 3}$
such gates are necessary for informational completeness, and that $2n$ suffice.
We conjecture that $2n$ gates are indeed both necessary and sufficient.
Finally, we unveil a tight connection between entanglement structure and
informational power of measurements implemented with $t$-doped Clifford
circuits. Our results recast notions of "magic" and stabilizerness - typically
framed in computational terms - into the setting of quantum metrology.

</details>


### [267] [Query-Optimal Estimation of Unitary Channels via Pauli Dimensionality](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.00168)
*Sabee Grewal,Daniel Liang*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 该研究提出了一种针对特定酉通道（Pauli谱仅限于小子群）的过程断层扫描算法，该算法在查询复杂度上达到了最优。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 目的是对Pauli谱限于大小为$2^k$的子群的未知酉通道进行分类，并提供一个与未知酉通道在钻石距离上$\\

Method: 提出了一种新的算法，该算法使用$O(2^k/\\epsilon)$次查询来实现目标，并证明了匹配的下界，证明了算法的查询最优性。

Result: 该算法在查询复杂度上达到了最优，并且对于$k=2n$的情况，恢复了Haah等人（FOCS '23）提出的查询最优$O(4^n/\\epsilon)$算法。

Conclusion: 研究结果在学习量子k-Juntas（仅在k个量子比特上非平凡作用的酉通道）和学习近乎Clifford的深度为$O(\\log \\log n)$的电路组合方面，都有显著的理论和效率提升。

Abstract: We study process tomography of unitary channels whose Pauli spectrum is
supported on a small subgroup. Given query access to an unknown unitary channel
whose Pauli spectrum is supported on a subgroup of size $2^k$, our goal is to
output a classical description that is $\epsilon$-close to the unknown unitary
in diamond distance. We present an algorithm that achieves this using
$O(2^k/\epsilon)$ queries, and we prove matching lower bounds, establishing
query optimality of our algorithm. When $k = 2n$, so that the support is the
full Pauli group, our result recovers the query-optimal $O(4^n/\epsilon)$-query
algorithm of Haah, Kothari, O'Donnell, and Tang [FOCS '23].
  Our result has two notable consequences. First, we give a query-optimal
$O(4^k/\epsilon)$-query algorithm for learning quantum $k$-juntas -- unitary
channels that act non-trivially on only $k$ of the $n$ qubits -- to accuracy
$\epsilon$ in diamond distance. This represents an exponential improvement in
both query and time complexity over prior work.
  Second, we give a computationally efficient algorithm for learning
compositions of depth-$O(\log \log n)$ circuits with near-Clifford circuits,
where "near-Clifford" means a Clifford circuit augmented with at most $O(\log
n)$ non-Clifford single-qubit gates. This unifies prior work, which could
handle only constant-depth circuits or near-Clifford circuits, but not their
composition.

</details>


### [268] [Advantage for Discrete Variational Quantum Algorithms in Circuit Recompilation](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.01154)
*Oleksandr Kyriienko,Chukwudubem Umeano,Zoë Holmes*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 量子算法（使用自适应量子设备访问）与仅依赖初始量子数据集的经典后处理方法之间的相对能力仍是积极辩论的主题。我们通过一个量子电路重新编译任务，展示了自适应和非自适应策略之间指数级分离的证据。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 本文旨在探究量子算法（使用自适应量子设备访问）与经典后处理方法（仅依赖初始量子数据集）之间的相对能力。

Method: 研究使用了一个包含离散优化问题的编译任务，该任务具有单峰但不可分离的损失景观，这种结构在经典优化中以其对自适应搜索的指数级优势而闻名。通过数值实验，比较了自适应和非自适应策略在解决这类问题上的表现。

Result: 数值实验表明，自适应优化能够有效地揭示在体量律纠缠和高魔量（high-magic）状态下运作的隐藏电路结构，而非自适应方法似乎仅限于需要指数级资源的穷举搜索。

Conclusion: 研究结果表明，自适应地访问量子硬件具有根本性的优势。

Abstract: The relative power of quantum algorithms, using an adaptive access to quantum
devices, versus classical post-processing methods that rely only on an initial
quantum data set, remains the subject of active debate. Here, we present
evidence for an exponential separation between adaptive and non-adaptive
strategies in a quantum circuit recompilation task. Our construction features
compilation problems with loss landscapes for discrete optimization that are
unimodal yet non-separable, a structure known in classical optimization to
confer exponential advantages to adaptive search. Numerical experiments show
that optimization can efficiently uncover hidden circuit structure operating in
the regime of volume-law entanglement and high-magic, while non-adaptive
approaches are seemingly limited to exhaustive search requiring exponential
resources. These results indicate that adaptive access to quantum hardware
provides a fundamental advantage.

</details>


### [269] [Quantum reservoir computing using Jaynes-Cummings model](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.00171)
*Sreetama Das,Gian Luca Giorgi,Roberta Zambrini*

Main category: quant-ph

TL;DR: 基于Jaynes-Cummings（JC）哈密顿量和其色散极限（DJC）的混合量子比特-玻色子系统可用于量子水库计算（QRC），该系统具有高维希尔伯特空间和内在非线性动力学，在时间序列处理方面表现出优于线性容量的非线性容量，并具有可比的预测能力。


<details>
  <summary>Details</summary>
Motivation: 研究混合量子比特-玻色子系统（JC和DJC模型）作为量子水库计算（QRC）的平台，探索其在时间序列处理中的潜力。

Method: 系统地基准测试了JC和DJC水库在线性和非线性记忆任务上的表现，并在Mackey-Glass时间序列上测试了它们的预测性能，同时研究了水库参数、高阶玻色子可观测值和时间复用对性能的影响。

Result: JC和DJC水库在线性和非线性记忆任务中表现出优越的非线性记忆容量，在Mackey-Glass时间序列预测方面具有可比的能力。研究表明，高阶玻色子可观测值和时间复用可以增强模型的表达能力。

Conclusion: 基于JC和DJC的水库是用于时间序列处理的多功能平台，能够克服等效量子比特对的限制，并为可调谐、高性能的量子机器学习架构提供了途径。

Abstract: We investigate quantum reservoir computing (QRC) using a hybrid qubit-boson
system described by the Jaynes-Cummings (JC) Hamiltonian and its dispersive
limit (DJC). These models provide high-dimensional Hilbert spaces and intrinsic
nonlinear dynamics, making them powerful substrates for temporal information
processing. We systematically benchmark both reservoirs through linear and
nonlinear memory tasks, demonstrating that they exhibit an unusual superior
nonlinear over linear memory capacity. We further test their predictive
performance on the Mackey-Glass time series, a widely used benchmark for
chaotic dynamics and show comparable forecasting ability. We also investigate
how memory and prediction accuracy vary with reservoir parameters, and show the
role of higher-order bosonic observables and time multiplexing in enhancing
expressivity, even in minimal spin-boson configurations. Our results establish
JC- and DJC-based reservoirs as versatile platforms for time-series processing
and as elementary units that overcome the setting of equivalent qubit pairs and
offer pathways towards tunable, high-performance quantum machine learning
architectures.

</details>


### [270] [SPAM Tolerance for Pauli Error Estimation](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.00230)
*Ryan O'Donnell,Samvitti Sharma*
